sentence.Network_en: This can become time - consuming and inefficient for the touch typist or frequent users of your application.

sentence.Network_en: James wasn't invited. We've been out of touch for years.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有邀请詹姆斯，我们已经多年未联系了。
